definition: history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: It is one of the famous paintings in the ancient Eygptian history.
sentences.chinese: 這是古老的埃及史上最著名的油畫之一。

sentences.english: The Restoration is an important transformable age in the history of finance and taxation in England .
sentences.chinese: 復辟時期是英國財政與稅收史上的一個重要轉型時代。

sentences.english: It may be Spain's most short-lived public company.
sentences.chinese: 它可能是西班牙史上最短命的上市公司。

sentences.english: The Beatles created some of the best-loved songs of all time.
sentences.chinese: 披頭四樂團創作出一些史上最受歡迎的歌曲。

sentences.english: The refined tastes is an important theory in the criticism history of Chinese statement poetry.
sentences.chinese: “騷雅”是中國詞學批評史上的一個重要理論。

sentences.english: They will be the finest cars ever built.
sentences.chinese: 它們將是汽車史上最優秀的車種。

sentences.english: This is the most famous, in the history of UFO, the "Roswell Incident".
sentences.chinese: 這就是不明飛行物史上最著名的“羅斯韋爾事件”。

sentences.english: This book since 1930's sold over 60 million copies. One of the best sellers in history.
sentences.chinese: 從30年代至今銷售超過6千萬本，史上最暢銷書籍。

sentences.english: Zhou Yang occupies an important place in contemporary and modern literary theory of China.
sentences.chinese: 周揚在中國現當代文論史上佔有重要地位。

sentences.english: Bo Pi is an important person in the late Spring and Autumn Period.
sentences.chinese: 伯喜否是春秋後期吳越爭霸史上的重要人物之一。

sentences.english: George Macartney Diplomatic Corps' visit to China was one of the important events in the relationship between China and Britain in history.
sentences.chinese: 馬葛爾尼使團訪華是中英關係史上的一件大事。

sentences.english: Mirror-image DNA is one of the greatest discoveries in the history of molecular biology.
sentences.chinese: 鏡像DNA的存在是分子生物學史上一個重要發現。

sentences.english: Confucius is the first editor in Chinese hist ory .
sentences.chinese: 孔子是我國曆史上第一位編輯家。

sentences.english: The position of Huang Yuji in the history of bibliography science is not to be ignored.
sentences.chinese: 黃虞稷在目錄學史上的地位不容忽視。

sentences.english: Ptolemaic Egypt was an important historical period during the development of ancient Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 托勒密王朝是古代埃及史上一個重要歷史時期。

sentences.english: The Cutty Sark was one of the fastest sailing ships that has ever been built.
sentences.chinese: 卡帝薩克號是帆船建造史上最快的一艘帆船。

definition: variant of 記錄|记录[ji4 lu4] (but in Taiwan, not for the verb sense "to record")
can be rated as/can be said to be
priority/sth advocated first/refers to ancient tradition: Worship the river first, then the sea.
history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China
to load into/to record/to write into/to enter (data)/to go into (the records)/to go down (in history)
